item.title: Moved Cloudflare Workers directly into existing Cloudflare listing
item.description: https://workers.cloudflare.com/ - - Deploy serverless code for free on Cloudflare's global network. 100,000 free requests per day with a workers.dev subdomain.

item.title: Rename workers.dev to Cloudflare Workers
item.description: https://workers.cloudflare.com/ - - Deploy serverless code for free on Cloudflare's global network. 100,000 free requests per day with a workers.dev subdomain.

item.title: add privacy management section
item.description:
#privacy-management -
https://www.bearer.sh/ - Helps implement privacy by design via audits and continuous workflows so that organizations comply with GDPR and other regulations. Free tier is limited to smaller teams and SaaS version only.
https://www.osano.com/ - Consent management and compliance platform with everything from GDPR representation to cookie banners. Free tier offers basic features.
https://www.iubenda.com/ - Privacy and cookie policies along with consent management. Free tier offers limited privacy and cookie policy as well as cookie banners.
https://cookiefirst.com/ - Cookie banners, auditing, and multi-language consent management solution. Free tier offers a one-time scan and a single banner.
https://www.ketch.com/ - Consent management and privacy framework tool. Free tier offers most features with a limited visitor count.

item.title: Add Mocki
item.description: https://mocki.io - A tool that lets you create mock GraphQL and REST APIs synced to a GitHub repository. Simple REST APIs are free to create and use without signup.

item.title: Add Format Express - update README.md
item.description: https://www.format-express.dev - - Instant online formatter for JSON / XML / SQL.

item.title: Amended description for Shake
item.description: https://www.shakebugs.com/ - In-app bug reporting and feedback tool for mobile apps. Free plan, 10 bug reports per app/per month.
